company_info.Company Description: ACMErange of client services includes Executive Search & Selection, Top, Middle & Lower Management Hiring, Project Based Hiring, Recruitment & Staffing  Process  that are delivered through our integrated suite of leadership services

jd_information.description: Required OUTBOUND TOUR MANAGER (UK, USA, Australia, Dubai, Schengen & Asian countries individual) for reputed leaders in the Indian Tour & Travel Industry in Delhi, Near Metro Station. Responsibility – Providing Travel Packages and Travel solutions to individual & Group, Handling B2C & Group queries, Preparations of Itineraries, making Hotel, air tickets etc. Providing Guidance and Assistance in Visa Documentation & Processing. If you are interested please mail your photo resume with following details (Post applied, Job Profile, present salary / CTC, Joining time etc). email : admin1@acme-hms.com and mobile no. 9911071022
